articles.title: 'I didn't even have a passport' - South Africa's pioneering black cricketers
articles.description: How two little-known black cricketers helped South Africa back into international cricket post-Apartheid.
articles.content:
India captain Mohammad Azharuddin and South Africa skipper Clive Rice shake hands before the first match between the two nations on the historic 1991 tour

articles.title: Proteas to tour New Zealand for Test series against ICC World Test Champions
articles.description: South Africa will travel to New Zealand for a two-Test series next year, Cricket South Africa has confirmed.
articles.content:
South Africa will travel to New Zealand for a two-Test series next year, Cricket South Africa (CSA) confirmed on Friday.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
